name: Staff of Ice
description: A mystical staff that harnesses the power of ice.
looks: The staff is made of shimmering blue crystal, with intricate ice patterns swirling around its surface. It has a frosty aura and emanates a chilling cold.

special_effects.Icy Blast: 20% chance to freeze the target and deal additional ice damage.

name: Magician's Robe
description: A flowing robe worn by wizards and sorcerers.
looks: The robe is made of fine silk and has a deep blue color. It is adorned with intricate golden embroidery and has a hood that can be pulled up to conceal the wearer's face.

name: Ring of Strength
description: A magical ring that enhances the wearer's strength.
looks: The ring is made of silver and has a large gemstone embedded in the center. The gemstone glows with a faint red light.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Healing Salve
description: A magical salve that restores health and heals wounds.
looks: The healing salve comes in a small glass bottle with a cork stopper. The liquid inside is a soothing shade of green.

name: Amulet of Protection
description: An enchanted amulet that provides protection against various types of damage.
looks: The amulet is made of a shimmering silver metal with a glowing gemstone in the center. It emits a faint protective aura.

special_effects.damage_reduction: Reduces incoming damage from all sources by 10%

name: Crystal Staff
description: A staff made of pure crystal, capable of harnessing powerful magical energies.
looks: The crystal staff is translucent and shines with a gentle, ethereal glow. It is adorned with intricate engravings that depict scenes of nature and magic.

special_effects.mana_surge: Increases spell damage by 20% for 10 seconds after casting a spell.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that enhances healing abilities.
looks: The staff is made of white oak and has intricate carvings of healing symbols along its length. The top of the staff is adorned with a large crystal that emits a soothing light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Creates a healing aura around the user, restoring HP to nearby allies.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that radiates healing energy.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood and adorned with small crystals that glow with a soft white light. It has a curved top and intricate carvings depicting symbols of healing.

special_effects.healing_pulse: Has a chance to release a healing wave that restores health to nearby allies.
